ANB-5368.Title: [NRT] Update real bonus service - betting bonus
ANB-5368.Precondizioni: Open ANB app while logged in and land on home page and profile menu.
ANB-5368.Risultato Atteso: Replace the current Real Bonus Service with the new one
ANB-5368.Author: Sota Mario

Steps.Step Description: Open the ANB app while logged in with an account balance of 0 euros.
Steps.Expected Result: ANB App opens correctly and user lands on homepage when logged in.

Steps.Step Description: Add a betting bonus (e.g. 10eu) from the NPPL platform.
Steps.Expected Result: The bonus addition is successful.

Steps.Step Description: Tap on another section of the app (e.g. mybets/cart).
Steps.Expected Result: User finds the updated bonus balance on the app header.

Steps.Step Description: Tap on Profile menu.
Steps.Expected Result: The user's profile menu should be opened and the betting bonus balance should be updated.

ANB-6078.Title: [NRT] - Bookings - Bookings - Booking with username + Point of sale (PDV)
ANB-6078.Author: Pizzo Davide EXT

Steps.Step Description: Open the ANB app
Steps.Expected Result: The app must be opened correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Bring results to cart (single/multiple/system).
Steps.Expected Result: The cart it must be populated correctly with the results.

Steps.Step Description: Tap on the CTA "Book"
Steps.Expected Result: It is verified that the ticket must be booked correctly and the informative snackbar "Bet booked - Go to mybets" comes out

Steps.Step Description: Tap on CTA "Add store" from mybets booked.
Steps.Expected Result: It is verified that when you tap on the item 'Add point of sale' a panel is displayed as follows:  Title: 'Add point of sale' Icon X > closes the panel without memorizing any characters entered in the input fields (it is possible to closeAlso by swipe down or tap in the section outside the panel) Description: 'Speed up the validation process of your booked plays' Input field Point of sale code > (described in the next ac) Input field username > (described in the next ac)Text: 'You can always play your reservations in all points of sale even if you haven't set a favorite one' CTA 'Save' > activates only if all fields have been filled in

Steps.Step Description: Bring another bet on Book with configured point of sale code.
Steps.Expected Result: It is verified that the ticket card appears at the lInstant Book together with the username of the store.

DIGB-68416.Title: Gestione Offerta di Gioco - BODG  - Ripristina su un brand le legature di uno o più market type per una manifestazione in BODG - Ripristina
DIGB-68416.Author: Fusco Edoardo

Steps.Step Description: Click on the "Restore" button
Steps.Expected Result: The system, after confirmation by the Actor, for each selected market type that has personalized binding values:1. Eliminates customizations on binding values 2. If the reference event has custom binding values: Displays in the grid the personalized binding values of the reference event 3. If the manifeReference station does NOT have personalized ligation values and the same market type has personalized ligation values for the reference sport: Displays in the grid the personalized binding values of the same market type for the reference sport;

4. If the reference event does NOT have personalized ligation values, the same market type does NOT have personalized ligation values for the reference sportAnd the reference sport has personalized ligation values: Displays in the grid the personalized ligation values of the reference sport; 5. If the reference manifestation does NOT have personalized binding values, theSame market type does NOT have customized binding values for the reference sport and the reference sport does NOT have customized binding values: Displays the dashe "-" in the grid in correspondence with the four expected ligation values (theMinimum and maximum guarantee for prematch and live);
6. Enable the "Confirm" button

DIGB-69637.Title: Modulo Trading - Registro accettazione - Brand Master+Italia -    Dettaglio biglietto - Indicazione dispositivi di vendita su biglietti venduti da TG Best Agenzia
DIGB-69637.Risultato Atteso: In the Ticket Detail, before the list of predictions, the Brand, the channel, the subchannel, the device and the number of sales TG must be reported.With tickets sold by portal by the Italia brand you can see: "ITALY - RETAIL - Agency - BEST - 191" followed by the thumbs up icon and the name of the trader who accepted the bet
DIGB-69637.Author: Zuco Alessandro

Steps.Step Description: Login to the TG Best certified on the agency network
Steps.Expected Result: The operation will be allowed

Steps.Step Description: From the SPORT section select from the tree on the left the discipline and then the event and compile a multiple bet by entering a bet that sends the bet to the console and then click on the bet button
Steps.Expected Result: The message is displayed "The bet is being accepted  Our players are evaluating your play. Don't refresh the page."

Steps.Step Description: Access the Trading Module, with special credentials, through the link: https://test-mt.sisal.com/risk-management-console and enable the console by clicking on AcceptNe ticket- Ticket acceptance and alarms and accept the bet just made
Steps.Expected Result: The bet is correctly sold

Steps.Step Description: From the trading module, Click sUl menu Monitoring - Register Acceptances and alarms and set through the selectboxes present in the header, the brand as master+Italy, the currency in EUR and on the selectbox Type leave "Acceptance" and press search and then click on the newly sold TSN
Steps.Expected Result: In the Ticket Detail, before the list of predictions, the Brand, the channel, the subchannel, the device and the number of sales TG must be reported.With tickets sold by portal by the Italia brand you can see: "ITALY - RETAIL - Agency - BEST - 191" followed by the thumbs up icon and the name of the trader who accepted the bet

DIGB-69737.Title: Modulo Trading - Registro autorizzazione - Brand Master+Pokerstars - Dettaglio Autorizzazione - Stato Rifiutato timeout
DIGB-69737.Risultato Atteso: The Authorization Detail opens and at the top right must be the red Label "Rejected timeout"
DIGB-69737.Author: Zuco Alessandro

Steps.Step Description: Access the trading module, with special credentials, through the link: https://test-mt.sisal.com/risk-management-console
Steps.Expected Result: The operation will be allowed

Steps.Step Description: Click on the Monitoring menu - Acceptances and alarms register and set through the selectboxes in the header, the brand as master+Pokerstars and the currencyIn EUR and on the selectbox Type leave "Acceptance"
Steps.Expected Result: The operation will be allowed

Steps.Step Description: Set the date set to "Date from" by entering a few days back from the current date so as to have a rangeOf wider results and set on the selectbox "Status" the Rejected timeout status and click on the search button
Steps.Expected Result: Tickets ordered by default by descending date, from the most recent to the oldest that meet the criterion are returnedEntered, in this case the tickets with the status Rejected timeout issued by the date-Time set.

Steps.Step Description: Click on an authorization code
Steps.Expected Result: The Authorization Detail opens and at the top right must be the red Label "Rejected timeout"

Steps.Step Description: Set the date set to "Issued by" by entering a few days back from the current date in order to have a range of resultsLarger and set the status Paid on the "Status" select box and click on the search button
Steps.Expected Result: Tickets ordered by default by decreasing date, from the most recent to the oldest that meet the criterion entered, are returned, in thisOr case the tickets with the Paid status issued by the date-Time set.

DIGB-70895.Title: Inserimento Risultati - Blocco Pagamenti - Verifiche lato My Bets - Scommessa Singola Prematch - Cluster semplici - Biglietto 1
DIGB-70895.Precondizioni: Access to the My BETS section
DIGB-70895.Risultato Atteso: The system will show the winning tickets with the winning label in green with their amount and the balance upstream of the page will be increased.There will also be a link to view the ticket details
DIGB-70895.Author: Corsi Alessia

Steps.Step Description: Access the link https://testfr-www.sisal.it/scommesse-matchpoint, authenticate NO with your user and anGive in the My Bets section and search for the winning tickets among the CLOSED bets
Steps.Expected Result: The system will show the vincent ticketsThem accompanied by a green winning label with its amount and the balance upstream of the page will be increased. There will also be a link to view the ticket details

Steps.Step Description: Access the ticket details
Steps.Expected Result: By accessing the ticket details from the appropriate link, the system will open the relative pop-up with: - typeOgia played (SNG, MUL, SYS) and date/time of sale - preview winning amount - event detail (event, Pal/Avv, description and competence) - bet sold and relative quota (if available info icon for CdE regulations) - total bet - sales share- winning or potential winning - drop-down menu showing ticket information (code, account number, date/time of sale, expiration date) - Message: Attention The payment of the bet is waiting for all results to be confirmed by AAMS. For more deTtagli consult the official results of the last 72 hours.

Steps.Step Description: Select the IB present in the ticket detail pop-up and copy it. Access the reserved area from the link https://testfr-www.sisal.it/scommesse-matchpoint, click on the Reserved Area icon at the top right, and on the "Account Movements" item in the menu on the left andSearch for movements related to the copied IB (e.g. DF07X00X0X00000X0000)
Steps.Expected Result: The system will show the list of movements related to the IB sought (e.g. DF07X00X0X00000X0000), The systemBut it will allow you to limit the list of tickets to the type of game that will be organized for: - date - type (sales, credits, transfers, etc.) - description - amount - receipt and serial ID

DIGB-83028.Title: POKERSTARS Promo Dynamic Recharge real bonus - Promo creation
DIGB-83028.Precondizioni: have valid login credentials (LDAP) have logged in to the NPPL portal https://test-promo-manager-pokerstars.sisal.it/fe/#/promo the promotional code must be made up of two alphanumeric strings separated by a hyphen (-)
DIGB-83028.Funzionalità: Promo Dynamic Recharge real bonus - Promo creation
DIGB-83028.Risultato Atteso: The promotion is successfully created by generating an identifying Promo ID.
DIGB-83028.Author: Battimo Giuseppe EXT
DIGB-83028.Note: Test case developed for NPPL Italy: https://prod-polarion.sisal.it/polarion/#/project/promoeloyalty/workitems/test?query=NPPL-8110

Steps.Step Description: the user accesses the NPPL portal: https://test-promo-manager-pokerstars.sisal.it/fe/#/promo
Steps.Expected Result: the user views the promotions list

Steps.Step Description: the user from the "PROMOTIONS" section clicks "on products"
Steps.Expected Result: the user views the list of product promotions

Steps.Step Description: the user clicks on the button: CREATE
Steps.Expected Result: the user opens the Create Promotion form

Steps.Step Description: ANAGRAFICA TABfill in name fill in description select calculation type: top-up select promo category: test select prize nature: Bonus select bonus type: Real bonus select deductibility: deductible select promotion type: single select prize accrual method: dynamic select prize payment method: manual "protocol required" flag: active
Steps.Expected Result: The "Next" CTA is activated

Steps.Step Description: user clicks on CTA : next
Steps.Expected Result: the user moves to the ELIGIBILITY tab

Steps.Step Description: ELIGIBILITY TAB select "Promo Eligibility Type": public
Steps.Expected Result: the "Next" CTA is activated

Steps.Step Description: user clicks on CTA : next
Steps.Expected Result: the user moves to the CONDITIONS tab

Steps.Step Description: CONDITIONS TAB select validity type: range insert date from/to select Membership method: promotional code fill in promotional code select Payment Channels: select all select Payment Methods: select all select Payment Channel Details: select all
Steps.Expected Result: the "Next" CTA is activated

Steps.Step Description: user clicks on CTA : next
Steps.Expected Result: the user moves to the CALCULATION PARAMETERS tab

Steps.Step Description: CALCULATION PARAMETERS TAB select bonus payment: instant select bonus amount type: fixed select bach type: single enter minimum top-up: €50 bonus amount: €10
Steps.Expected Result: the "Next" CTA is activated

Steps.Step Description: user clicks on CTA : next
Steps.Expected Result: the user moves to the EROGAZIONE tab

Steps.Step Description: EROGAZIONE TAB preview information flag: on Bonus distribution: single select template: casino select spendability channels: select all fill in bonus name select bonus expiry: within + number of days
Steps.Expected Result: the "Next" CTA is activated

Steps.Step Description: user clicks on CTA : next
Steps.Expected Result: the user moves to the INFORMATION tab

Steps.Step Description: INFORMATION TAB click on: generate information
Steps.Expected Result: inside the fields: "title" and "information" the information relating to the promo is generated

Steps.Step Description: user clicks on CTA : save
Steps.Expected Result: The promotion is successfully created by generating an identifying Promo ID.

RETB-8897.Title: [QA Automation] TG Best Italia - R2I - SPORT - 'Sisal.it' mode - Create and sell a "Multipla with NUMBER OF ESITI = MAX NUMBER" ticket from PREMATCH section

RETB-8897.Note: Test case developed for NPPL Italy: https://prod-polarion.sisal.it/polarion/#/project/promoeloyalty/workitems/test?query=NPPL-8110

Steps.Step Description: The user clicks on section PREMATCH (F1)
Steps.Expected Result:
Section opened_x000D_
​​

Steps.Step Description: The user select Client1from cart
Steps.Expected Result: Cart section related to client selected is displayed

Steps.Step Description:
Using "Sisal it" mode, the user inserts 30 esiti for a MULTIPLA_x000D_
 (MAX NUMBER of esiti = 30)
Steps.Expected Result: Esiti added to cart section related to Client selected

Steps.Step Description:
The user set a valid stake amout (default or higher) choosing one of the following ways:_x000D_
 _x000D_
* OR clicking on + button_x000D_
Steps.Expected Result: Stake amount inserted without errors

Steps.Step Description:
The user sell the ticket choosing one of the following ways:_x000D_
 _x000D_
* OR using shortcut CTRL+ENTER _x000D_
Steps.Expected Result: Verify that the ticket is sold

RETB-10442.Title: [QA Automation] TG Best Italia - R2I - SPORT - Reservation by CODE - Check that reservation can be sold from cart
RETB-10442.Precondizioni: A SINGOLA/MULTIPLA/SISTEMA reservation has been created from Betting Online
RETB-10442.Risultato Atteso: Reservation' can be sold from cart
RETB-10442.Author: De Matteis Vera
RETB-10442.Note: Test case developed for NPPL Italy: https://prod-polarion.sisal.it/polarion/#/project/promoeloyalty/workitems/test?query=NPPL-8110

Steps.Step Description: The user clicks on section PRENOTAZIONI (F7)
Steps.Expected Result:
Section opened_x000D_
​​

Steps.Step Description: The user reads the actual cash balance and the current tickets status
Steps.Expected Result: Information about cash balance, Client1's ticket status and Client2's ticket status are displayed

Steps.Step Description: The user select Client1 or Client2 from cart
Steps.Expected Result: Cart section related to client selected is displayed

Steps.Step Description: The user inserts the reservation Code of a SINGOLA reservation
Steps.Expected Result: Reservation pop-up is opened_x000D_

Steps.Step Description: The user clicks on MODIFY BUTTON from reservation
Steps.Expected Result: Reservation is updated in the cart

Steps.Step Description: The user clicks on SELL BUTTON from cart
Steps.Expected Result:
Verify that:_x000D_
 _x000D_
* The ticket is sold from reservation section_x000D_
* The TICKET NUMBER (emitted) is updated correctly for CLIENT selected in cart_x000D_
* The TICKET NUMBER (emitted) is NOT updated for other CLIENT_x000D_
* The TOTAL related to CLIENT selected in cart is updated correctly_x000D_
* The TOTAL related to other CLIENT is NOT updated_x000D_
* The CASH BALANCE is updated correctly_x000D_
